caption.p: ELISA analysis of NAbs to Gn truncated segments. ( A, B) The truncated segments, coated at 0.2 μg/well in a 96-well plate, were incubated with threefold serial dilutions of the indicated NAbs. 1332F11 and 1331E4 were diluted at 10 μg/mL and 3 μg/mL in an initial well, respectively. 32a represents pET-32a empty vector. ( C) The anti-His antibody (1:5000 initial dilution) was used as positive control. The optical density (OD) was measured at OD 450–OD 630. Sigmoid curves were generated through GraphPad Prism 8. Sigmoid neutralizing curves were generated through GraphPad Prism 8.
